AddressingMode.longDescription: Specify whether SPMA or FPMA addressing will be used for FCoE transactions.

BannerMessageTimeout.longDescription: Specify the number of seconds that the OptionROM banner is displayed during POST.

BlnkLeds.longDescription: Specify the number of seconds the LEDs on physical network port should blink to assist with port identification.

BootOptionROM.longDescription: Controls the enablement of legacy Boot Protocols in the Option ROM.

BootOrderFirstFCoETarget.longDescription: Specify this port's place in the FCoE boot order 1-4 or 0=disabled.

BootOrderFourthFCoETarget.longDescription: Specify this port's place in the FCoE boot order 1-4 or 0=disabled.

BootOrderSecondFCoETarget.longDescription: Specify this port's place in the FCoE boot order 1-4 or 0=disabled.

BootOrderThirdFCoETarget.longDescription: Specify this port's place in the FCoE boot order 1-4 or 0=disabled.

BootRetryCnt.longDescription: Specify the number of retries to attempt in case of a boot failure.

BootStrapType.longDescription: Specify the boot strap method used to boot to the operating system.

BusDeviceFunction.longDescription: Specify the PCI Address of the card.

BusDeviceFunction[Partition:n].longDescription: Specify the PCI Address of the card.

ChapAuthEnable.longDescription: Enable the ability of the initiator to use CHAP authentication when connecting to the iSCSI target.

ChapMutualAuth.longDescription: To use mutual CHAP authentication, specify an initiator secret on the Initiator Parameters page and configure that secret on the target.

ConfigureFormRef[Partition:n].longDescription: Configure partition functionality (e.g., NIC, iSCSI Offload, FCoE), and view assigned addresses.  (Vendor modify as appropriate).

ConfigureFormn.longDescription: Configure partition functionality (e.g., NIC, iSCSI Offload, FCoE), and view assigned addresses. (Vendor modify as appropriate).

ConfigureLogicalPortsSupport.longDescription: Indicates the support for configuring the number of ports on the device.

CongestionNotification.longDescription: Indicates whether Congestion Notification capability is supported.

ConnectFirstFCoETarget.longDescription: Specify whether the FCoE initiator is to connect to the first FCoE storage target.

ConnectFirstTgt.longDescription: Enable connecting to the first iSCSI target.

ConnectSecondTgt.longDescription: Enable connecting to the second iSCSI target.

DCBSettings.longDescription: View available Data Center Bridging (DCB) settings for the controller and configure available controller settings, such as PFC, ETS and CN.  [VENDOR Modify as appropriate for the current implementation.]

DCBSettingsRef.longDescription: View available Data Center Bridging (DCB) settings for the controller and configure available controller settings, such as PFC, ETS and CN Settings.

DCBXSupport.longDescription: Specify whether Data Center Bridging eXchange Protocol (DCBX) is supported.

DeviceLevelConfig.longDescription: View and configure global device level parameters such as SR-IOV and Virtualization Mode.

DeviceLevelConfigurationRef.longDescription: View and configure global device level parameters such as Virtualization Mode.

DeviceName.longDescription: Official product name of the device.

DhcpVendId.longDescription: Control what Vendor ID is presented to the DHCP service.

EFIVersion.longDescription: Installed device EFI driver version information.

EVBModesSupport.longDescription: Indicates the type of EVB Modes supported.

EnergyEfficientEthernet.longDescription: Indicates whether Energy Efficient Ethernet capability is supported.

EnhancedTransmissionSelection.longDescription: Indicates whether Enhanced Transmission Selection capability is supported.

FCoEBootScanSelection.longDescription: Specify the FCoE initiator behavior for booting the system from specified Fibre Channel boot target(s) or fabric discovered target(s).

FCoEBootSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether Fibre Channel over Ethernet Boot capability is supported.

FCoEConfigRef.longDescription: Configure MTU and FCoE Boot parameters.

FCoEConfiguration.longDescription: Configure FCoE MTU and  other Boot parameters.

FCoEFabricDiscoveryRetryCnt.longDescription: Specify the retry count for FCoE fabric discovery.

FCoEFirstHddTarget.longDescription: Specify whether the FCoE target is represented as the first HDD to the system.

FCoEGenParams.longDescription: Configure general parameters that apply to all FCoE functionality.

FCoEGenParamsRef.longDescription: Configure general parameters that apply to all FCoE functionality.

FCoELnkUpDelayTime.longDescription: Specify how long the FCoE Initiator waits after an Ethernet link is established before sending any data over the network.  Units are in seconds.

FCoELunBusyRetryCnt.longDescription: Specify the number of connection retries the FCoE boot initiator will attempt if the FCoE target LUN is busy.

FCoEOffloadMode.longDescription: Enables the port for FCoE storage traffic.

FCoEOffloadMode[Partition:n].longDescription: Enables the partition for FCoE storage traffic.

FCoETgtBoot.longDescription: Enables the FCoE initiator to boot the system to the FCoE target. One Time Disabled disables FCoE boot for the next (current) boot, after which it is enabled.

FIPMacAddr.longDescription: Permanent FIP-MAC address for FCoE assigned during manufacturing.

FIPMacAddr[Partition:n].longDescription: Permanent FIP-MAC address for FCoE assigned during manufacturing.

FamilyVersion.longDescription: Installed device firmware family version information.

FeatureLicensingSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether Dell Feature Licensing capability is supported.

FirstFCoEBootTargetLUN.longDescription: Specify the boot Logical Unit Number (LUN) of the first FCoE storage target that will be used by the FCoE initiator.

FirstFCoEFCFVLANID.longDescription: Specify the VLAN ID to be used in connecting to the first FC storage target.

FirstFCoEWWPNTarget.longDescription: Specify the World Wide Port Name (WWPN) of the first FCoE storage target.

FirstHddTarget.longDescription: Specify whether the iSCSI target appears as the first hard disk drive (HDD) in the system.

FirstTgtBootLun.longDescription: Specify the boot Logical Unit Number (LUN) on the first iSCSI storage target.

FirstTgtChapId.longDescription: Specify the first iSCSI storage target Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) ID. [vendor to specify what is allowed].

FirstTgtChapPwd.longDescription: Specify the Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol secret (CHAP password) of the first iSCSI storage target.  [Vendor to specify what is allowed].

FirstTgtIpAddress.longDescription: Specify the IP address of the first iSCSI target.

FirstTgtIpVer.longDescription: Specify whether IPv4 or IPv4 network addressing will be used for first iSCSI target.

FirstTgtIscsiName.longDescription: Specify the iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN) of the first iSCSI storage target.

FirstTgtTcpPort.longDescription: Specify the TCP Port number of the first iSCSI target.

FlexAddressing.longDescription: Indicates whether Dell FlexAddressing feature is supported.

FlowControlSetting.longDescription: Specify the type of Flow Control to be used by the port when operating in NPar mode.

GlobalBandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Controls for TX bandwidth allocation across enabled partitions on the port.

GlobalBandwidthAllocationRef.longDescription: Controls for TX bandwidth allocation across enabled partitions on the port.

HairpinMode.longDescription: Indicates Hairpin Mode settings per partition for Switch Dependent Partitioning modes.

HideSetupPrompt.longDescription: Specify whether to display or hide the legacy Option ROM setup prompt during system Power On Self Test (POST).

IpAutoConfig.longDescription: This option is specific to IPv6. Controls the source of the initiator IP address, DHCP or static assignment.

IpVer.longDescription: Specify whether IPv4 or IPv6 network addressing will be used for iSCSI initiator and targets (Applies to the Initiator only when a seperate target IP Version is implemented).  [Vendor to provide implementation-specific language].

IscsiFirstTgtParams.longDescription: Enables connection and configure communication parameters for the first iSCSI target.

IscsiFirstTgtParamsRef.longDescription: Enable connection and configure communication parameters for the first iSCSI target.

IscsiInitiatorChapId.longDescription: Specify the iSCSI initiator Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) ID.  [Vendor to describe what is allowed].

IscsiInitiatorChapPwd.longDescription: Specify the iSCSI initiator Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) secret (password).   [Vendor to describe what is allowed].

IscsiInitiatorGateway.longDescription: Specify the IP address of the default Gateway used by the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpAddr.longDescription: Specify the IP address of the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv4Addr.longDescription: Specify the IPv4 address of the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv4Gateway.longDescription: Specify the IPv4 IP address of the default Gateway used by the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv4PrimDns.longDescription: Specify the IPv4 IP address of the Primary DNS used by the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv4SecDns.longDescription: Specify the IPv4  IP address of the Secondary DNS used by the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv6Addr.longDescription: Specify the IPv6 IP address of the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv6Gateway.longDescription: Specify the IPv6 IP address of the default Gateway used by the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv6PrimDns.longDescription: Specify the IPv6 IP address of the Primary DNS used by the  iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorIpv6SecDns.longDescription: Specify the IPv6 IP address of the Secondary DNS used by the  iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorName.longDescription: Specify the initiator's iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN).

IscsiInitiatorParams.longDescription: Configuration of  iSCSI initiator parameters (e.g., IP Address, Subnet Mask).

IscsiInitiatorParamsRef.longDescription: Configuration of iSCSI initiator parameters (e.g., IP Address, Subnet Mask).

IscsiInitiatorPrimDns.longDescription: Specify the Primary DNS IP address used by the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorSecDns.longDescription: Specify the Secondary DNS IP address used by the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorSubnet.longDescription: Specify the IPv4 Subnet Mask of the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiInitiatorSubnetPrefix.longDescription: Specify the IPv6 Subnet Mask Prefix of the iSCSI initiator.

IscsiMacAddr.longDescription: Permanent MAC address for iSCSI offload assigned during manufacturing.

IscsiMacAddr[Partition:n].longDescription: Permanent MAC address for iSCSI offload assigned during manufacturing.

IscsiSecondTgtParams.longDescription: Enable connection and configure communication parameters for the second iSCSI target.

IscsiSecondTgtParamsRef.longDescription: Enable connection and configure communication parameters for the second iSCSI target.

IscsiSecondaryDeviceParams.longDescription: Configures a second iSCSI boot adapter for redundancy in case the primary adapter fails to boot.

IscsiSecondaryDeviceParamsRef.longDescription: Configures a second iSCSI boot adapter for redundancy in the event the primary adapter fails to boot.

IscsiTgtBoot.longDescription: Specify whether the iSCSI initiator will boot to the specified iSCSI target after connection. One Time Disabled disables iSCSI boot for the next (current) boot, after which it is enabled.

IscsiVLanId.longDescription: Specify the VLAN ID to be used for iSCSI boot mode. The VLAN ID must be in the range from 1 to 4094.  [Vendor confirm support for this range].

IscsiVLanMode.longDescription: Specify use of a VLAN tag to be used by iSCSI boot.

IscsiViaDHCP.longDescription: Enables the acquisition of iSCSI target parameters from DHCP.

LegacyBootProto.longDescription: Select a non-UEFI network boot protocol to be used.

LinkStatus.longDescription: Physical link status of the network port  as reported by the controller.

LnkSpeed.longDescription: Specifies the port link speed to be used when booting the selected protocol.

LnkUpDelayTime.longDescription: Specifies how long the iSCSI boot host software should wait, in seconds, after an Ethernet link is established before sending any data over the network.

LogicalPortEnable.longDescription: Enables or disables the port from appearing as a physical function to the system

LunBusyRetryCnt.longDescription: Specify the number of connection attempts the iSCSI boot initiator will attempt if the iSCSI target LUN is busy.

MTUParams.longDescription: Specify the scope of the MTU (Maximum Transmission Unit) parameter.

MTUReconfigurationSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether the MTU Reconfiguration capability is supported.

MacAddr.longDescription: Permanent MAC address assigned during manufacturing.

MacAddr[Partition:n].longDescription: Permanent MAC address assigned during manufacturing.

MaxBandwidth[Partition:n].longDescription: Maximum Bandwidth represents the maximum transmit bandwidth of the partition as a percentage of the full physical port link speed.  The Maximum Bandwidth range is 0-100 percent for each enabled partition.

MaxFrameSize.longDescription: Maximum frame size for each FCoE frame.

MaxIOsPerSession.longDescription: Maximum number of IOs supported per session.

MaxNPIVPerPort.longDescription: Maximum number of NPIV WWN per port.

MaxNumberLogins.description: Maximum Number of LOGINs per Port
MaxNumberLogins.longDescription: Maximum number of logins supported per port.

MaxNumberOfFCTargets.description: Maximum Number of FC Targets Supported
MaxNumberOfFCTargets.longDescription: Maximum number of FC targets supported.

MaxNumberOutStandingCommands.longDescription: Maximum number of outstanding commands supported across all sessions.

MaxNumberVFSupportedByDevice.description: Number of PCI Virtual Functions Supported

MgmtSVID.longDescription: Represents and enables configuration or the switch VLAN ID (SVID) for the iDRAC service processor.

MinBandwidth[Partition:n].longDescription: [Vendor: modify as appropriate.] Minimum Bandwidth represents the minimum transmit bandwidth of the partition as a percentage of the full physical port link speed.  The Minimum Bandwidth range is 0-100 percent for each enabled partition.

NICConfig.longDescription: Configure Boot Protocol, Wake on LAN, Link Speed, and VLAN.

NICConfigRef.longDescription: Configuration of Boot Protocol, Wake on LAN, Link Speed, and VLAN.

NICPartitioningConfig.longDescription: Configure functionality of NIC partitions (e.g., NIC, iSCSI Offload, FCoE), and view assigned addresses.

NICPartitioningConfigRef.longDescription: Configure functionality of NIC partitions (e.g., NIC, iSCSI Offload, FCoE), and view assigned addresses.

NPCP.longDescription: Controls whether Network Partition Control Protocol is enabled or disabled. The NPCP setting on the adapter must match the setting on the link partner.

NParEP.longDescription: NParEP mode enables more than 8 partitions on the device. It must not be enabled if the system and OS do not support devices with more than 8 PCI Physical Functions.

NWManagementPassThrough.longDescription: Indicates whether the Network Management Pass Through capability is supported.

NetworkPartitioningMode.longDescription: Specify the NPar mode of operation for all ports of the adapter. Switch Independent Partitioning mode places no special requirements on the link partner. Switch Dependent Partitioning mode requires that the link partner is a switch that supports Switch Dependent Partitioning.

NicMode.longDescription: Specify use of the port for L2-Ethernet traffic.

NicMode[Partition:n].longDescription: Specify use of the partition for L2-Ethernet traffic.

NicPartitioning.longDescription: Enables or disables NIC partitioning for all device ports.

NicPartitioningSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether NIC Partitioning capability is supported.

NumberPCIFunctionsEnabled.description: Number of PCI Physical Functions Currently Enabled per Port
NumberPCIFunctionsEnabled.longDescription: The number of PCI Physical Functions currently enabled on this port.

NumberPCIFunctionsSupported.longDescription: Defines the maximum number of PFs that can be enabled within the domain specified by VFAllocBasis.

NumberVFAdvertised.longDescription: Specify the number of PCI Virtual Functions (VFs) to be advertised on this port in non-NPAR mode.

NumberVFAdvertised[Partition:n].longDescription: Specify the number of PCI Virtual Functions (VFs) to be advertised on this partition (PF) in PCI config space. The number of advertised VFs on each partition must add up to be less than or equal to the number of PCI Virtual Functions supported by the device or port.  [VENDOR modify appropriately for the implementation].

NumberVFSupported.longDescription: The number of virtual functions supported on this port (or device) [VENDOR modify appropriately for the implementation].

NumberVFSupported[Partition:n].description: Number of Virtual Functions Supported per partition

OSBMCManagementPassThrough.longDescription: Indicates whether OS-BMC Management Pass Through capability is supported.

OnChipThermalSensor.longDescription: Indicates whether an on-chip thermal sensor is available.

PCIDeviceID.longDescription: PCI Device ID of the controller.

PCIDeviceID[Partition:n].longDescription: PCI Device ID of the partition.

PXEBootSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether PXE Boot capability is supported.

PartitionStateInterpretation.longDescription: Describes how partitioning is implemented and how the PartitionState attribute is used in the controller.

PartitionState[Partition:n].longDescription: Representation of the current enablement state of the partition.

PortNumber[Partition:n].longDescription: Port that the partition belongs to.  Replace n with the number of the partition.

PriorityGroup0BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 0 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup0ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 0.

PriorityGroup15BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 15 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup15ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 15.

PriorityGroup1BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 1 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup1ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 1.

PriorityGroup2BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 2 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup2ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 2.

PriorityGroup3BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 3 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup3ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 3.

PriorityGroup4BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 4 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup4ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 4.

PriorityGroup5BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 5 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup5ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 5.

PriorityGroup6BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 6 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup6ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 6.

PriorityGroup7BandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the percentage of total port bandwidth to be assigned to Priority Group 7 traffic.  The summation of bandwidth allocations from all Priority Groups must equal 100%.

PriorityGroup7ProtocolAssignment.longDescription: Specify what protocol (traffic type) is assigned to Priority Group 7.

PriorityGroupBandwidthAllocation.longDescription: Specify the allocation of network port bandwidth by Priority Group.  Format in a colon-separated list for all Priority Groups without omission.  Values in the list from left to right apply to PG0-7 and PG15 inclusively (e.g. PG0BW:PG1BW:PG2BW:PG3BW:PG4BW:PG5BW:PG6BW:PG7BW:PG15BW).  The sum of all Priority Group allocations must equal 100.

RDMAApplicationProfile.longDescription: Specify the RDMA application profile setting to use in operation.  [Vendor to clarify availability and usage].

RDMANICModeOnPartition.longDescription: Specify use of the partition for both L2-Ethernet and RDMA traffic. [Vendor may want to customize type of RDMA supported].

RDMANICModeOnPort.longDescription: Specify use of the port for both L2-Ethernet and RDMA traffic.  [Vendor may want to customize type of RDMA supported].

RDMAProtocolSupport.longDescription: Specify what RDMA Protocol is to be used in operation. [Vendor modify as appropriate].

RDMASupport.longDescription: Indicates whether any RDMA protocol is supported by the controller.

RXFlowControl.longDescription: Indicates whether Receive (RX) Flow control capability is supported.

RemotePHY.longDescription: Indicates whether RemotePHY capability is supported.

SRIOVSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether SR-IOV capability is supported.

SVID[Partition:n].longDescription: The Switch VLAN Identifier (SVID) of the partition.

SecondTgtBootLun.longDescription: Specify the boot Logical Unit Number (LUN) on the second iSCSI storage target.

SecondTgtChapId.longDescription: Specify the Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) ID of the second iSCSI storage target.  [Vendor to specify what is allowed].

SecondTgtChapPwd.longDescription: Specify the Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) secret (target CHAP password) of the second iSCSI storage target.  [Vendor to specify what is allowed].

SecondTgtIpAddress.longDescription: Specify the IP address of the second iSCSI target.

SecondTgtIpVer.longDescription: Specify whether IPv4 or IPv4 network addressing will be used for the second iSCSI target.

SecondTgtIscsiName.longDescription: Specify the iSCSI Qualified Name (IQN) of the second iSCSI storage target.

SecondTgtTcpPort.longDescription: Specify the TCP Port number of the second iSCSI target.

SecondaryDeviceMacAddr.longDescription: Specify the MAC address of a secondary iSCSI boot adapter for redundancy in case of a boot failure.

SwitchDepPartitioningSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether Switch Dependent Partitioning capability is supported.

TOESupport.longDescription: Indicates whether TCP/IP Offload Engine capability is supported.

TXBandwidthControlMaximum.longDescription: Indicates whether Transmit(TX) Bandwidth Control Maximum capability is supported.

TXBandwidthControlMinimum.longDescription: Indicates whether Transmit (TX) Bandwidth Control Minimum capability is supported.

TXFlowControl.longDescription: Indicates whether Transmit (TX) Flow Control capability is supported.

TcpIpViaDHCP.longDescription: This option is specific to IPv4.  Controls the source of the initiator IP address, DHCP or static assignment.

TcpTimestmp.longDescription: Specify use of TCP timestamps in network packets, as defined in RFC 1323.

TotalNumberLogicalPorts.longDescription: Indicates the total number of logical ports on the device

UseIndTgtName.longDescription: Specify whether to use Independent Target Name when MPIO is enabled.

UseIndTgtPortal.longDescription: Specify whether to use Independent Target Portal (Enable when using MPIO mode).

VFAllocBasis.longDescription: Defines the domain in which Virtual Functions are allocated.

VFAllocMult.longDescription: [VENDOR provide appropriate help text for the implementation - what is allowed, etc].

VFDistribution.longDescription: Defines the distribution of VFs to PFs within the domain specified by VFAllocBasis. A value appears in the colon separated list for each Physical Function that can potentially be present within the allocation domain. Values in the list from left to right apply to function numbers in the domain from least to greatest.  [VENDOR modify appropriately]

VLanId.longDescription: Specify the VLAN tag to be used with the selected boot protocol. The VLAN ID must be in the range from 1 to 4094.  [Vendor to provide implementation-specific language].

VLanMode.longDescription: Virtual LAN mode enables use of a VLAN tag to be used by [vendor specify boot protocols that support VLAN].

VirtFIPMacAddr.longDescription: Programmatically assignable FIP-MAC address for FCoE.

VirtFIPMacAddr[Partition:n].longDescription: Programmatically assignable FIP-MAC address for partition FCoE.

VirtIscsiMacAddr.longDescription: Programmatically assignable MAC address for iSCSI offload.

VirtIscsiMacAddr[Partition:n].longDescription: Programmatically assignable MAC address for partition iSCSI offload.

VirtMacAddr.longDescription: Programmatically assignable MAC address for port.

VirtMacAddr[Partition:n].longDescription: Programmatically assignable MAC address for partition.

VirtWWN.longDescription: Programmatically assignable Fibre Channel World Wide Node Name identifier for FCoE.

VirtWWN[Partition:n].longDescription: Programmatically assignable Fibre Channel World Wide Node Name identifier for partition FCoE.

VirtWWPN.longDescription: Programmatically assignable Fibre Channel World Wide Port Name identifier for FCoE.

VirtWWPN[Partition:n].longDescription: Programmatically assignable Fibre Channel World Wide Port Name identifier for partition FCoE.

VirtualizationMode.longDescription: Specify the type of virtualization used by the controller on all ports.

VndrConfigPage.longDescription: View device information and edit device configuration parameters.

VndrFormSet.description: <Device Name> - <Current active MAC address of port or 1st partition>

WWN.longDescription: Fibre Channel World Wide Node Name identifier for FCoE

WWN[Partition:n].longDescription: Fibre Channel World Wide Node Name identifier for FCoE. Replace n with the number of the partition.

WWPN.longDescription: Fibre Channel World Wide Port Name identifier for FCoE.

WWPN[Partition:n].longDescription: Fibre Channel World Wide Port Name identifier for FCoE assigned during manufacturing.  Replace n with the number of the partition.

WakeOnLan.longDescription: Enables the server to be powered on using an in-band magic packet.

WakeOnLanLnkSpeed.longDescription: Select the port speed used for Wake on LAN mode.

WinHbaBootMode.longDescription: Enable iSCSI Offload HBA boot mode and disables iSCSI software initiator boot mode.

iSCSIBootSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether iSCSI Boot capability is supported.

iSCSIConfig.longDescription: Configure general, initiator and target parameters for iSCSI boot.

iSCSIConfigRef.longDescription: Configure general, initiator and target parameters for iSCSI boot.

iSCSIDualIPVersionSupport.longDescription: Indicates support for simultaneous IPv4 and IPv6 configurations of iSCSI initiator and iSCSI primary and secondary targets.

iSCSIOffloadSupport.longDescription: Indicates whether iSCSI Offload capability is supported.

iScsiOffloadMode.longDescription: Specify use of the port for iSCSI offload storage traffic.

iScsiOffloadMode[Partition:n].longDescription: Specify use of the partition for iSCSI offload storage traffic.
